channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @jayrosen_nyu How about two highly respected New Yorker writers and Mitt Romney.
@jayrosen_nyu really well-respected reporters, for example from the new yorker. yes?
@gwthompson @jessegrosjean @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news That's correct. Electric Drummer is the same outliner. Different package.
@jessegrosjean @gwthompson @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news Good.
@Larry_Huppert Thanks. Sounds like Alexa (or Google Assistant) are not yet portable, which is a shame.

There's a new Mac outliner which is designed to interop with Drummer. Gotta love that. Everyone should use an outliner, imho, but no one seems to agree on how they should work. And there are so many things you want to plug into outliners, no one product can do them all.
All that is why you want to tie them all together to so you can use multiple tools to work on them, like PDF or GIF or RSS. The format is way too valuable to lock the user into a single editor.
And we're at a good point where there's lots of movement and no one is dominant.

BTW, to reporters who think Twitter is useless. Here's a case study. I wanted to learn about portable speakers with Alexa built in. So I asked about it here. https://t.co/sUuLcAARI1 Lots of info, great background for a purchase, then a report. https://t.co/CwmG1jb0ov
@jessegrosjean @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news It would kind of make sense in the File menu. ;-) But it was added as an "experimental" feature, ie after the UI was more or less done. ;-)
Larry David FTX Commercial. https://t.co/Q3X2MtPrnI
@jessegrosjean @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news The first command in the Tools menu downloads all your files in a folder, zipped.
@espiers @nytopinion wow. you have arrived. i hope you'll still remember The Little People. ;-)

@jessegrosjean @chriseidhof @WorkFlowy @checkvist_news I'm glad to see you're supporting OPML as a native file format. We should test to see if it interops my Drummer, my latest outliner, whose native format is OPML. https://t.co/jBvvd07MwT
Hackers can steal your Tesla Model 3, Y using new Bluetooth attack. https://t.co/tKzbaxQhkf

@phonetonote Maybe a subset of this will prove useful? A plug-in that creates an OPML version of your current outline that can then be plugged into anything that handles OPML, fir example every RSS reader.
A Quarter Of All EV Chargers Don't Work, Half Of Car Trips Are Less Than 3 Miles. https://t.co/grUr9EF1pg
@sistermedia Would you like me to block you?

Okay Leon Muks is a Republican. Someone should find out if he's anti-abortion. He should probably go into hiding for a while. I liked him better when I didn't know he's a fascist.
One more thing..
💩
@jeremyzilar You have one of these??

So I bought an expensive Bose speaker to play Alexa, and the thing delegates to other Alexas in my house. If I say "Alexa WNYC" nothing comes out of the Bose speaker but the other three Alexas in my house start playing WNYC. And the sound is kind of like the $40 speaker I bought.
It took 1/2 hour to set up and update, and I had to give it access to everything just to get to Hello World, and after a couple of minutes, I think it's going back.
Here's my full review.
https://t.co/CwmG1jb0ov
I'm returning it.
@bruces OK to repost this pic?
